ftw.specs module¶

ftw.specs.make_individual_environment_spec_from_marl_env(environment: dm_env._environment.Environment) → acme.specs.EnvironmentSpec¶

Returns an EnvironmentSpec describing values used by an environment.

This implementation for MARL environments assumes that specs for observation, action & reward are represented as a tuple.

This happens automatically when you convert an OpenAI Gym type of MARL environment to a dm_env.Environment via ftw.wrappers.MARLGymWrapper if your implementation meets the following requirements:

  • implements the following attributes/properties: - ‘observation_space’ - ‘action_space’ - ‘reward_space’

  • all these attributes/properties are gym.spaces.Tuple,

This function only works as expected when the following conditions hold for every tuple:

  • each spec tuple has as many elements as agents in the environment

  • the elements in a tuple are all identical, i.e. the specifications are the same for every agent.
